I've been wanting more flags but also wanted something that would fit in better with a game featuring little green aliens.

There is also a certain amount of semantic cohesion. Terrestrial planets are hexagons with triangle insets, while gas giants are hexagons with bands. Massive moons are relatively large squared diamonds, while tiny moons are little squared diamonds.

The alien text is actually reversed English or Latin using the Wintermute font. The result looks vaguely but not quite like Hebrew.

The other two flags (which, yes, aren't reversed and don't use Wintermute, don't @ me) is my personal KSP YouTube brand, and I included them for completeness.

And of course, there's my Jeb flag. Because of course Jeb has his own flag.

I made these flags for my own KSP install, but if there's enough demand, I'll put together an installation bundle and maybe put it on CKAN.

Let me know what you think!

These are cool!

 

10/10 would use in every save file I have... All three of them! XD
I updated Moho's flag. Moho, Dres, and Eeloo looked too similar, so I reversed Moho's colors to differentiate it more.
